comments.creator: richard@sherpa.co.nz
comments.text:
The following changes have been made:
* note added to [release notes](https://wiki.developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Mozilla/Firefox/Releases/77#Manifest_changes)
* compatibility data updated, see PR[6112](https://github.com/mdn/browser-compat-data/pull/6112)
* notes added to the Extension Workshop article on requesting permissions, see PR[636](https://github.com/mozilla/extension-workshop/pull/636)

Please let me know if you think further changes are needed.
comments.raw_text:
The following changes have been made:
* note added to [release notes](https://wiki.developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Mozilla/Firefox/Releases/77#Manifest_changes)
* compatibility data updated, see PR[6112](https://github.com/mdn/browser-compat-data/pull/6112)
* notes added to the Extension Workshop article on requesting permissions, see PR[636](https://github.com/mozilla/extension-workshop/pull/636)

Please let me know if you think further changes are needed.
